text: Edwin A. Gomes (February 25, 1936 â€“ December 22, 2020) was an American politician. He was a member of the Connecticut State Senate from 2015 until 2019. Before that, he was a member of the state senate from November 2005 to January 2013. Gomes was a member of the Democratic Party. Gomes was born in New Bedford, Massachusetts. Gomes died on December 22, 2020 in Bridgeport, Connecticut from injuries caused by a car crash, aged 84.Former state Sen. Edwin Gomes dies nine days after car crash ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Road accident deaths in the United States Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from Massachusetts Category:Politicians from Connecticut Category:People from Bridgeport, Connecticut Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Ed Gomes
